original_text:
On the lips of him who has understanding, wisdom is found,
    but a rod is for the back of him who lacks sense.
korean_text: 명철한 자의 입술에는 지혜가 있어도 지혜 없는 자의 등을 위하여는 채찍이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: On the lips of him who has understanding
but a rod is for the back of him who lacks sense.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 분별 없는 자의 등에는 매가 있다
